reviews.review: They dont update at the pace of other current new gen titles. Used to be fun with a massive comminuty backing, but now feels stale.
GÜZEL OYUN ZEVKLİ FAKAT ÇOK HİLE VAR ARTIK Bİ CİDDEN İLGİLENSENİZ !

Tbh there better options in an fps game, this is just really basic search and destroy. It really only has nostalgic value. I am pretty biased too as i prefer games where i can actually aim down sight with and not just play based of a hip fire pattern.

I like to play casually but if you are new to the game, you will need to study the spray pattern if you want to do competitive or just get better at the game.
This game made me smash my keyboard into my face.

You don't need a computer that can run crysis to run this game. People still play it after the first one was released 21 years ago. In an age where the world has gone to shit, few things bring me more pleasure.

jogo muito legal, menos a comunidade tóxica =]

more fun if you get the expensive skins

Jogo bastante dinâmico, ideal para quem gosta de partidas rápidas (no modo casual). Gráficos de alta qualidade, boa opção de equipamentos para ambas as equipes, o que deixa o jogo bem equilibrado. O menu de configuração disponibiliza uma vasta lista de itens para personalizar o jogo e deixá-lo com uma jogabilidade ideal a cada usuário. O excesso de skins de personagens descaracterizou um pouco o jogo, na minha opinião, e ainda verifica-se muito o uso de hacks por parte de alguns jogadores apesar das melhorias realizadas constantemente pelos desenvolvedores.
bad game lost so mutch money free to play but i speant at least 5000 and gaint back like 1000
